power.title: Blade Sweep
power.fluff: Though the fury of your attack is directed at a single foe, no nearby enemy is spared your wrath
power.section: Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit:2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true Each bloodied enemy within your reach takes damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.
true 1 Rageblood Vigor:Non-bloodied enemies within your reach also take the damage.
Miss:One bloodied enemy within your reach, other than the target, takes damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.
1 Rageblood Vigor:You can choose a non-bloodied enemy instead.
1 Whirling Frenzy:A second bloodied enemy within your reach, other than the target, takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your off-hand weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Blood Strike
power.fluff: Blood calls to blood, your and your enemy's pain giving strength to your assault
power.section: Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. AC
1 If you are bloodied, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll
true Hit:2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true If the target is bloodied, the attack deals +1d12 damage.
Miss:If the target is bloodied, it takes damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Brutal Slam
power.fluff: Your forceful blow pushes your foe into its companions
power.section: Attack:Melee weaponone creature that is smaller than you, your size, or one size larger than you Strength vs. Fortitude
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares and knock it prone.
true As long as the forced movement wasn't negated, one enemy adjacent to the target takes 6 + your Strength modifier damage.
true 1 Critical:On a critical hit, the second enemy is also knocked prone.

power.title: Daring Charge
power.fluff: You leap forward and charge your foes, each strike against you only serving to embolden your attack
power.section: true 1 Thaneborn Triumph:You gain a bonus to all defenses equal to your Charisma modifier against attacks triggered by your movement during the charge.
true 1 Whirling Frenzy:Each enemy that hits you with an attack triggered by your movement during the charge takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your off-hand weapon's enhancement bonus.
Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. AC
1 You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll for each attack triggered by your movement
true Hit:2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true 1 Rageblood Vigor:For each attack triggered by your movement during the charge, you deal an additional +2 damage.

power.title: Hammer Fall
power.fluff: You swing your weapon in a great underhand arc, and the impact lifts your target off its feet and sends it crashing to the ground
power.section: Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. Fortitude
1 If the target is smaller than you, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll
true Hit:2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target up to 2 squares and knock it prone.
Miss:Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage.
If the target is your size category or smaller, you push it half the distance square.

power.title: Implacable Predator
power.fluff: You keep close to your foe after your strike, ready to follow if it tries to flee
power.section: Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit:2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Effect:The first time the target moves or is pushed, pulled or slid before the end of your next turn, you can shift up to your speed to a square adjacent to the target as a free reaction after it has finished the move.

power.title: Longstrike Charge
power.fluff: You surge toward your target, using your momentum and the leverage from your weapon's length to land the blow
power.section: Attack:melee weaponone creature Strength vs. AC
1 You gain a +1 bonus to the attack roll for each square you move during the charge
true Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

power.title: Rippling Blades
power.fluff: If your foe avoids your attack, you accept a glancing blow to maneuver it to a weak position
power.section: Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit:2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Miss:You take damage equal to 1 + one-half the target's level. You gain a benefit based on your Feral Might.
1 Rageblood Vigor:The first attack you hit the target with before the end of your next turn deals additional damage equal to 2 + your Constitution modifier.
1 Thaneborn Triumph:The target has a penalty to all defenses against the next attack against it before the end of your next turn. The penalty equals your Charisma modifier.
1 Thunderborn Wrath:You push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier. The next charge attack against it before the end of your next turn has combat advantage.
1 Whirling Frenzy:You can make a melee basic attack using your off-hand weapon against the target.

power.title: Roaring Challenge
power.fluff: You let out a roar of challenge that you follow up with a mighty strike

section.name: Roar Target:
section.target: each enemy in the blast that can see or hear you

power.section: true Effect:You mark each target until the end of your next turn.
You then make the Challenger Strike.

part.section: Strike Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. AC
1 If the target is marked by you, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll
Special:If the target was a roar target, you can treat this attack as having the Fear keyword.

power.title: Shatterbone Strike
power.fluff: The fury of your assault leaves your foe off balance, leaving a hole in its defense
power.section: Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit:2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.
true 1 Rageblood Vigor:If you are bloodied, the penalty equals your Constitution modifier (minimum 2).
true 1 Thaneborn Triumph:The first attack against the target before the end of your next turn gains a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Charisma modifier.
true 1 Whirling Frenzy:If the target moves before the start of your next turn, your next attack before the end of your next turn has combat advantage.

power.title: Thundering Howl
power.fluff: You strike, then let out a thunderous battle cry that sends each enemy back
power.section: Primary Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit:1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true 1 Critical:If your attack was a critical, the howl attack knocks the primary target prone.
Effect:You make the howl attack.
You must include the primary target in the howl attack's area.

part.section: true Effect:Each target takes 1d6 thunder damage, and you push it 1 square.
true 1 Thunderborn Wrath:You push each target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier instead.
true If the primary attack missed, you add your Constitution modifier to the thunder damage against the primary target.

power.title: Thunder Strike
power.fluff: You attack your foe with such crushing force that those around it can feel the effects
power.section: Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit:2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true Each creature adjacent to the target other than you takes thunder damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.
true 1 Rageblood Vigor:If you are bloodied, the thunder damage increases by +5.
true 1 Thunderborn Wrath:You can push each creature that takes the thunder damage. The push is 1 square away from the target.
Miss:The target takes thunder damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Whirling Step
power.fluff: You strike out and keep moving, enemies beginning to bleed as you pass them
power.section: Attack:Melee weaponone creature Strength vs. AC (main hand)
true Hit:1[W] (main) + Strength modifier damage.
Effect:You shift 2 squares.
1 Whirling Frenzy:The number of squares you can shift equals 1 + your Dexterity modifier (minimum 3 squares).
At any point during the shift or after it, you can deal 1[W] (off-hand) damage to one creature other than the target and within your reach.

If the attack missed, you can deal damage to a second creature other than the target and within your reach. You can deal both damages at the same or at different times. The second damage equals your Dexterity modifier + your main weapon's enhancement bonus.
